title: Easy: FizzBuzz Counter
description:
Write a function that takes an integer `n` as input and returns the number of times Fizz, Buzz or both appear in the range from 1 to `n`. A Fizz appears every third number, a Buzz appears every fifth number. Both can appear at the same time.

#### Function Signature
```python
def count_fizz_buzz(n: int) -> int:
```

#### Input
- `n` (int): The upper limit of the range from 1 to `n`. inclusive.

#### Output
- Returns the number of times Fizz, Buzz or both appear in the range from 1 to `n`.
